Bangladesh: Battle of Buxar, another decisive company victory over local forces.
India: Battle of Buxar (British victory against allied Mughal, Bengal and Oudh forces)
Nepal: British East India Company gains control of Bengal
Philippine: de Anda hands over the control of the colonial government to Francisco Javier de la Torre, newly appointed Governor-General (1764–1765)
The last of the British ships that sailed to Manila leaves the Philippines for India, ending the British occupation.
Poland:
Convocation Sejm
Election of Stanisław August Poniatowski
Coronation of Stanisław August Poniatowski
Russia: A group of soldiers attempted to release the imprisoned Ivan VI; he was murdered.
